text:
Welcome to Khalil Hearing Care and Optics – Your Trusted Partner in Audiology & Eye Care

At Khalil Hearing Care and Optics, we are dedicated to improving your quality of life through expert hearing and vision care. As a full-service audiological and optical clinic, we offer a wide range of professional services and high-quality products tailored to meet your individual needs.

Our audiology department provides comprehensive diagnostic and rehabilitative services, including hearing tests, PTA (Pure Tone Audiometry), tympanometry, and other advanced hearing assessments. We also specialize in fitting and selling top-brand hearing aids, hearing aid batteries, ear molds, and hearing accessories to ensure you hear the world clearly and confidently.

In our optical section, we provide thorough eye examinations, expert vision consultations, and a stylish collection of eyeglasses, sunglasses, lenses, and contact lenses to suit every face and lifestyle.

Whether you're looking to improve your hearing, enhance your vision, or both — Khalil Hearing Care and Optics is your one-stop destination for trusted care, modern technology, and personalized service.

Your hearing. Your vision. Your life – we care for it all.
